name: netdata
description: Netdata is a real-time performance monitoring platform for servers, containers, and applications. It provides actionable dashboards with alerts and metrics, supporting both self-hosted and SaaS deployments.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Per-second metric collection and visualization for immediate system insights

features.title: Comprehensive Metrics
features.description: Track CPU, memory, disk, network, applications, and custom metrics automatically

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Drill down into metrics with zoom, pan, and correlation features for analysis

features.title: Anomaly Detection
features.description: Machine learning algorithms identify unusual patterns and potential issues

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Configure alerts with multiple channels including email, Slack, PagerDuty, and webhooks

features.title: Zero Configuration
features.description: Auto-detects services and starts monitoring immediately after installation

features.title: Low Overhead
features.description: Efficient C implementation uses minimal CPU and memory while collecting thousands of metrics

features.title: Distributed Monitoring
features.description: Aggregate metrics from multiple nodes into centralized dashboards
